official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to construct a project to provide flood control on Braes Bayou in Harris County, Texas.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a project for flood control on Braes Bayou, Texas.
